basics.name: Philipp Walter
basics.label: Fullstack Engineer
basics.summary: I build scalable applications for web, mobile and desktop. My interests lie in FinTech, InsureTech and Saas. Experienced co-workers, clear processes and focus on the end-product have a high priority for me.

highlights: Launched multiple web products built from front to back
Worked in large team coordinated mostly remotely
Followed agile development processes in a structured environment
Built a design system for company wide usage
Rewrote multiple frontends using TypeScript and other technologies
Ensured test coverage with unit testing, visual regression and e2e tests
Took ownership of features from design to implementation and testing to deployment
Worked closely with product, designers, backend developers and QA
Followed an agile development process with short release cycles and highly frequent deployments

work.summary: Web agency that builds web and mobile apps and also complex custom solutions. Conception, design, development, hosting and maintainance
highlights: Designed architecture to improve project maintainability
Set up build tooling and development environments with Docker
Wrote documentation to ease developer onboarding
Mentored junior developers and taught best practices
Advised customers in technical meetings and via online communications
Continually evaluated emerging technologies and shared them with the team
Optimized internal documentation and processes
Introduced infrastructure and organizational tools to the team
Ensured the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Developed web apps, mobile apps marketing sites
Consulted clients and teams regarding web solutions
Enhancement and maintainance of legacy web applications
Training of clients in various CMS

skills.name: Stacks
keywords: JAM Stack for blogs & marketing sites

references.name: Vinzenz Schwarz (abss interactive)
references.reference: Mr. Walter was able to convince both as a project manager of individual projects and as a team player. He has a wide, always available expertise, with which he solved even difficult questions successfully. On his own initiative, he was always educated and always ready to share his knowledge and skills with others. (translated)
